pros: I like everything about the gun, it's very easy to use, you can track all the pipeline of candidates, interact with people.

pros: It has a mobile app and it has a pipeline feature

pros: Recruitee helps us to streamline our recruiting and onboarding process. It forces us to follow guidelines and deadlines and make our process much more professional.
